name: Ext_R3_ElementDefinition_co_source
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ElementDefinition.constraint.source for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ElementDefinition.constraint.source from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ElementDefinition|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Reference to original source of constraint
element.definition: A reference to the original source of the constraint, for traceability purposes.
element.comment: `ElementDefinition.constraint.source` maps to R4 `ElementDefinition.constraint.source`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
